fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data

Interface IItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataStructure, ISecure, Iterable<IData>

    public interface IItem
extends IDataStructure, ISecure
    Provides access to a single data record provided by a data source obtained from a connector.

    Thread-safety: implementations of this interface are not required to be safe for concurrent access. Therefore, processing should generally not be shared between multiple threads.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    ITemplateItem

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IConnector getConnector()
      Gets the connector that provides access to the data source.
      ISource getSource()
      Gets the data source that provides access to records.
      ITicket getTicket()
      Gets the authenticated user ticket that was used when fetching data.
      boolean isModified()
      Indicates whether or not this item has been modified since being fetched.

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        ISource getSource()
        Gets the data source that provides access to records.
        Returns:
        the source.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getConnector

        IConnector getConnector()
        Gets the connector that provides access to the data source. This is the same as calling ISource.getSourceConnector() on the source.
        Returns:
        the connector.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Indicates whether or not this item has been modified since being fetched.
        Returns:
        true if the item has been updated, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IData.isModified()

      • getTicket

        ITicket getTicket()
        Gets the authenticated user ticket that was used when fetching data. The user may be associated with rules for data access and workflow.

        This is the ticket that will be used when storing items.

        Returns:
        the non-null authenticated user ticket.
        Since:
        1.0
